title: Painted Narrative Scroll of Pabuji and Devnarayan
description: Handpainted center with plain end panels.  Upper edge with Rope inserted in border.  Very faded lower left corner which is ripped and mended in three places.  Lower right corner in area 14.25 x 41 inches also rubbed and lacking pigments.  Rip along lower edge 75\" from lower edge. 1\" hole along upper edge 7-8\" from upper right corner.  Other paint losses along upper and lower borders.
creditline: Gift of Pat and Paul O'Connor
